info.title: udsaes/dwd_data_access
info.description: [dwd_data_access](https://github.com/UdSAES/dwd_data_access) provides an API to query weather data that has previously been downloaded by [dwd_data_crawler](https://github.com/UdSAES/dwd_data_crawler) from opendata.dwd.de (free service offered by [DWD](https://www.dwd.de/EN/ourservices/opendata/opendata.html)).

get.summary: Get the actual reported weather data at a given station for a given value of interest within a given time interval

parameters.name: startTimestamp
parameters.description: The inclusive start timestamp for the queried timeseries in UNIX EPOCH in ms resolution. If no value is given, the current timestamp minus 25 hours is used.

parameters.name: endTimestamp
parameters.description: The exclusive end timestamp for the queried timeseries in UNIX EPOCH in ms resolution. If no value is given, the current timestamp is used.

get.summary: Get a COSMO-D2 forecast for a given reference timestamp, a given value of interest and a given location

parameters.name: referenceTimestamp
parameters.description: The reference timestamp as UNIX EPOCH in ms resolution that shall be provided (00/03/06/09/12/15/18/21 UTC)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the location in [decimal degrees](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decimal_degrees)

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: The longitude of the location in [decimal degrees](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decimal_degrees)

200.description: The requested forecast data which is based on the closest grid point in the COSMO-D2 model for the given location (latitude and longitude)

get.summary: Get a MOSMIX forecast created at a given reference timestamp, for a given station and value of interest

parameters.name: referenceTimestamp
parameters.description: The reference timestamp as UNIX EPOCH in ms resolution that shall be provided (06/18 UTC before 2018-09-12, 03/09/15/21 UTC afterwards)

get.summary: Get the list of defined points of interest
Get the latest measurement data for the chosen point of interest (48 h)

parameters.name: poi_id
parameters.description: The id of the point of interest for which the forecast shall be provided.

get.summary: Get the newest 27 h forecast for the given point of interest

parameters.name: poi_id
parameters.description: The id of the point of interest for which the forecast shall be provided.

get.summary: Get the newest 45 h forecast for the given point of interest

parameters.name: poi_id
parameters.description: The id of the point of interest for which the forecast shall be provided.

id.description: The identifier of the point of interest (uuid v4 string)

name.description: The clear text name of the point of interest (should NOT be used as identifier)

enum: Data basis: Deutscher Wetterdienst, own elements added

location.description: The location the measurements refer to

poi.description: The identifier of the point of interest

measurements.description: The actual measurement values as an array of timeseries

enum: Data basis: Deutscher Wetterdienst, own elements added

forecastModelType.description: The model which has been been used as basis for the forecast

location.description: The location the forecast refers to

poi.description: The identifier of the point of interest

referenceTimestamp.description: The unix timestamp (in ms resolution) which is the reference of the forecast

forecasts.description: The actual forecasts as an array of timeseries

unit.description: Unit of the data, formatted as defined in the [Modelica Specification v3.4](https://www.modelica.org/documents/ModelicaSpec34.pdf), Chapter 19.

timestamp.description: The timestamp (as unix timestamp in ms resolution) of the timeseries to which the value refers to

value.description: The value of the timeseries at the timestamp (unit as specified above)

elevation.description: Height above sea level in metres

sid.name: sid
sid.description: The id of the weather station

voi.name: voi
voi.description: The value of interest for which the forecast shall be provided

tags.name: General
tags.description: Access to specific values of interest (VOIs) for specific time frames at a specific location within the entire data set available on the server (not cached)

tags.name: POI-based
tags.description: Access to the latest forecasts and measurements for pre-defined POIs (cached)
